experience.description: Maintained, monitored of high-load systems and services. Performed java-backend manual, load and automated testing, made a different set of QA environment improvements.

Was responsible for analysis and optimization of system performance - bottleneck search, improvement system fault tolerance and stability. Developed services for workflow automation. Built the CI/CD infrastructure and processes for my team using the Hashicorp stack (Consul,Vault,Nomad), Jenkins Job DSL.
Built monitoring with VictoriaMetrics stack, made the infrastructure transition to the Yandex.Cloud with Terraform.

Prepared the cloud infrastructure for the new License Vault product, interacted with SRE/Monitoring teams on SLO and alert configuration. Maintained the current dev/staging/prod infrastructure of the team.
Maintained the dev development environment, CI/CD and all related tools, such as Gitblab/Artifactory, custom python scripts and etc.

System performance analysis and optimization - search for bottlenecks, increase system fault tolerance and stability. Optimizing HPA/VPA usage in k8s. Building a python platform for the whole company.
